quests.desc: Get ready to pick stuff up and put it in places, because you've just entered TextWorld! First of all, you could, like, attempt to take a trip east. Then, make an attempt to head east. Once you accomplish that, attempt to go to the north. After that, try to go west. After that, try to head west. And then, head west. Next, go west. And then, try to head south. Then, make an attempt to travel east. Once you manage that, head south. Following that, travel east. After that, make an attempt to head east. If you can succeed at that, take a trip east. And then, lift the passkey from the floor of the dish-pit. That's it!

infos.name: recreation zone
infos.desc:
You have walked into the most ordinary of all possible recreation zones.



There is an unblocked exit to the east. There is an unblocked exit to the north. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going south. There is an exit to the west. Don't worry, it is unguarded.

infos.name: washroom
infos.desc:
You've entered a washroom.



You need an unblocked exit? You should try going east. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going north. You don't like doors? Why not try going south, that entranceway is unblocked.

infos.name: bar
infos.desc:
A crooked placard tells you that you are now in the bar.

 Oh, great. Here's a mantelpiece. The mantelpiece is typical.[if there is something on the s_0] On the mantelpiece you see [a list of things on the s_0].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_0] But the thing hasn't got anything on it. What, you think everything in TextWorld should have stuff on it?[end if]

There is an unblocked exit to the north. You don't like doors? Why not try going west, that entranceway is unblocked.

infos.name: cookhouse
infos.desc:
If you're wondering why everything seems so typical all of a sudden, it's because you've just sauntered into the cookhouse.

 You make out [if c_0 is locked]a locked[else if c_0 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] chest.[if c_0 is open and there is something in the c_0] The chest contains [a list of things in the c_0]. Something scurries by right in the corner of your eye. Probably nothing.[end if][if c_0 is open and the c_0 contains nothing] Empty! What kind of nightmare TextWorld is this?[end if]

You don't like doors? Why not try going east, that entranceway is unguarded. There is an unblocked exit to the south. You don't like doors? Why not try going west, that entranceway is unguarded.

infos.name: launderette
infos.desc:
Okay, so you're in a launderette, cool, but is it normal? You better believe it is. Let's see what's in here.

 You make out [if c_1 is locked]a locked[else if c_1 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] cabinet right there by you.[if c_1 is open and there is something in the c_1] The cabinet contains [a list of things in the c_1].[end if][if c_1 is open and the c_1 contains nothing] The cabinet is empty! What a waste of a day![end if]

You need an unguarded exit? You should try going east. There is an exit to the south. Don't worry, it is unblocked.

infos.name: bedchamber
infos.desc:
You've entered a bedchamber. You decide to just list off a complete list of everything you see in the room, because hey, why not?



There is an exit to the east. Don't worry, it is unblocked. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going west.

infos.name: study
infos.desc:
Ah, the study. This is some kind of study, really great ordinary vibes in this place, a wonderful ordinary atmosphere.

 You see a case.[if c_2 is open and there is something in the c_2] The case contains [a list of things in the c_2]. Classic TextWorld.[end if][if c_2 is open and the c_2 contains nothing] What a letdown! The case is empty![end if] Oh wow! Is that what I think it is? It is! It's a shelf. [if there is something on the s_1]You see [a list of things on the s_1] on the shelf. It doesn't get more TextWorld than this![end if][if there is nothing on the s_1]The shelf appears to be empty.[end if]

You need an unblocked exit? You should try going east. There is an exit to the south. Don't worry, it is unguarded. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going west.

infos.name: studio
infos.desc:
You find yourself in a studio. An ordinary one. You try to gain information on your surroundings by using a technique you call 'looking.'

 You can make out a trunk.[if c_3 is open and there is something in the c_3] The trunk contains [a list of things in the c_3].[end if][if c_3 is open and the c_3 contains nothing] The trunk is empty, what a horrible day![end if] You rest your hand against a wall, but you miss the wall and fall onto a bookshelf. You wonder idly who left that here. The bookshelf is normal.[if there is something on the s_2] On the bookshelf you can make out [a list of things on the s_2].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_2] However, the bookshelf, like an empty bookshelf, has nothing on it.[end if]

You don't like doors? Why not try going south, that entranceway is unblocked. You don't like doors? Why not try going west, that entranceway is unguarded.

infos.name: cubicle
infos.desc:
You've entered a cubicle.

 You see a stand. The stand is normal.[if there is something on the s_3] On the stand you see [a list of things on the s_3].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_3] But there isn't a thing on it.[end if]

There is an unblocked exit to the north. There is an unguarded exit to the south. There is an unblocked exit to the west.

infos.name: laundromat
infos.desc:
You have walked into a laundromat. Not the laundromat you'd expect. No, this is a laundromat. The room seems oddly familiar, as though it were only superficially different from the other rooms in the building.

 You can see a rack. Now why would someone leave that there? The rack is usual.[if there is something on the s_4] On the rack you can see [a list of things on the s_4]. There's something strange about this thing being here, but you don't have time to worry about that now.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_4] But the thing is empty.[end if]

There is an exit to the east. Don't worry, it is unblocked. There is an exit to the north. Don't worry, it is unblocked. There is an unguarded exit to the south. You don't like doors? Why not try going west, that entranceway is unguarded.

infos.name: parlor
infos.desc:
If you're wondering why everything seems so normal all of a sudden, it's because you've just walked into the parlor. You begin looking for stuff.

 You can make out [if c_4 is locked]a locked[else if c_4 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] suitcase close by.[if c_4 is open and there is something in the c_4] The suitcase contains [a list of things in the c_4].[end if][if c_4 is open and the c_4 contains nothing] Empty! What kind of nightmare TextWorld is this?[end if] You can see [if c_5 is locked]a locked[else if c_5 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] basket.[if c_5 is open and there is something in the c_5] The basket contains [a list of things in the c_5]. There's something strange about this being here, but you can't put your finger on it.[end if][if c_5 is open and the c_5 contains nothing] The basket is empty! This is the worst thing that could possibly happen, ever![end if]

There is an unblocked exit to the east. You don't like doors? Why not try going south, that entranceway is unguarded. There is an exit to the west. Don't worry, it is unguarded.

infos.name: attic
infos.desc:
You're now in an attic.



There is an exit to the west. Don't worry, it is unguarded.

infos.name: workshop
infos.desc:
You've entered a workshop.



There is an unblocked exit to the east. There is an exit to the north. Don't worry, it is unguarded. You don't like doors? Why not try going west, that entranceway is unblocked.

infos.name: chamber
infos.desc:
You find yourself in a chamber. An ordinary kind of place.

 You can make out a desk. [if there is something on the s_5]On the desk you make out [a list of things on the s_5].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_5]But the thing hasn't got anything on it. It would have been so cool if there was stuff on the desk.[end if]

You don't like doors? Why not try going east, that entranceway is unguarded. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going north. There is an exit to the south. Don't worry, it is unguarded. You don't like doors? Why not try going west, that entranceway is unguarded.

infos.name: office
infos.desc:
You are in an office. A typical one.

 You can see a chair. The chair is ordinary.[if there is something on the s_6] On the chair you can see [a list of things on the s_6].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_6] But the thing hasn't got anything on it.[end if] You can make out a table. The table is ordinary.[if there is something on the s_7] On the table you can see [a list of things on the s_7]. You shudder, but continue examining the room.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_7] But the thing hasn't got anything on it. Oh! Why couldn't there just be stuff on it?[end if]

There is an exit to the east. Don't worry, it is unguarded. You don't like doors? Why not try going north, that entranceway is unblocked.

infos.name: vault
infos.desc:
You're now in the vault. You start to take note of what's in the room.

 You make out a counter. [if there is something on the s_8]You see [a list of things on the s_8] on the counter.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_8]But the thing is empty.[end if] Oh, great. Here's a workbench. The workbench is standard.[if there is something on the s_9] On the workbench you can make out [a list of things on the s_9]. It doesn't get more TextWorld than this![end if][if there is nothing on the s_9] But the thing hasn't got anything on it. It would have been so cool if there was stuff on the workbench.[end if]

You don't like doors? Why not try going east, that entranceway is unguarded. There is an exit to the north. Don't worry, it is unblocked.

infos.name: dish-pit
infos.desc:
You find yourself in a dish-pit. An ordinary one.

 You see a freezer.[if c_6 is open and there is something in the c_6] The freezer contains [a list of things in the c_6].[end if][if c_6 is open and the c_6 contains nothing] The freezer is empty! This is the worst thing that could possibly happen, ever![end if] You make out a board. [if there is something on the s_10]On the board you can make out [a list of things on the s_10].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_10]But the thing is empty, unfortunately.[end if]

There is an unguarded exit to the north. There is an unguarded exit to the south. There is an unblocked exit to the west.

infos.name: salon
infos.desc:
You're now in the salon.

 Oh wow! Is that what I think it is? It is! It's a recliner. The recliner is ordinary.[if there is something on the s_11] On the recliner you make out [a list of things on the s_11].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_11] Unfortunately, there isn't a thing on it.[end if]

You don't like doors? Why not try going east, that entranceway is unblocked. There is an unguarded exit to the north. There is an unblocked exit to the south. You don't like doors? Why not try going west, that entranceway is unguarded.

infos.name: silent cubicle
infos.desc:
You arrive in a cubicle. A silent one.

 You see a locker.[if c_7 is open and there is something in the c_7] The locker contains [a list of things in the c_7].[end if][if c_7 is open and the c_7 contains nothing] The locker is empty, what a horrible day![end if]

You need an unblocked exit? You should try going east. You don't like doors? Why not try going north, that entranceway is unblocked. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going south. You don't like doors? Why not try going west, that entranceway is unblocked.

infos.name: shower
infos.desc:
You are in a shower. A standard kind of place.



There is an unguarded exit to the east. You don't like doors? Why not try going north, that entranceway is unblocked.

infos.name: chest
infos.desc: The chest looks strong, and impossible to break. [if open]You can see inside it.[else if closed]You can't see inside it because the lid's in your way.[otherwise]There is a lock on it.[end if]

infos.name: cabinet
infos.desc: The cabinet looks strong, and impossible to destroy. [if open]It is open.[else if closed]It is closed.[otherwise]It is locked.[end if]

infos.name: case
infos.desc: The case looks strong, and impossible to break. [if open]It is open.[else if closed]It is closed.[otherwise]It is locked.[end if]

infos.name: trunk
infos.desc: The trunk looks strong, and impossible to crack. [if open]You can see inside it.[else if closed]You can't see inside it because the lid's in your way.[otherwise]There is a lock on it.[end if]

infos.name: passkey
infos.desc: The metal of the passkey is hammered.

infos.name: key
infos.desc: The key is weighty.

infos.name: mantelpiece
infos.desc: The mantelpiece is undependable.

infos.name: shelf
infos.desc: The shelf is balanced.

infos.name: board
infos.desc: The board is solid.

infos.name: recliner
infos.desc: The recliner is shaky.

infos.name: bookshelf
infos.desc: The bookshelf is reliable.

infos.name: stand
infos.desc: The stand is undependable.

infos.name: rack
infos.desc: The rack is solid.

infos.name: desk
infos.desc: The desk is shaky.

infos.name: chair
infos.desc: The chair is stable.

infos.name: table

infos.name: counter

infos.name: workbench
infos.desc: The workbench is stable.

objective: You are now playing a exciting game of TextWorld! Here is how to play! First off, venture east. After that, move east. Following that, travel north. And then, head west. After that, take a trip west. And then, venture west. Next, take a trip west. Then, attempt to head south. Then, make an attempt to go east. And then, head south. With that done, head east. That done, go east. Then, go to the east. Okay, and then, retrieve the passkey from the floor of the dish-pit. And if you do that, you're the winner!
